questions: Do you enforce MFA for all privileged accounts?
How do you manage offboarding access?
Describe your encryption methods for data at rest and in transit.
List all security certifications you currently hold.

vendor_responses.q: Do you enforce MFA for all privileged accounts?
vendor_responses.answer: Yes, MFA is enabled for all admins via Google Workspace.

vendor_responses.q: How do you manage offboarding access?
Describe your encryption methods for data at rest and in transit.
vendor_responses.answer: AES-256 at rest; TLS 1.2 in transit.

vendor_responses.q: List all security certifications you currently hold.
